briefTitle: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Ryanodex as Adjuvant Treatment in Subjects With EHS
officialTitle: Phase 3, Multi-Center, Double-Blind, Randomized, 2-Arm, Parallel Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Ryanodex (EGL-4104) as Adjuvant Treatment in Subjects With Exertional Heat Stroke (EHS)
summary: A double-blind, parallel study of Ryanodex for the adjuvant treatment of exertional heat stroke (EHS) compared to current Standard of Care (SOC) for EHS.
